trans-unit.note: The label for the menu item to filter the displayed plants by grow zone.
Title for the 'My garden' screen where the user can see the list of plants that have been added to their garden.
Title for the plant list screen where the user can see a list of plants available to add to their garden.
Text for the header of the plant list page indicating the available plants for users to choose from.
Title for the plant details screen where the user can see the details for a specific plant.
Button text that prompts user to navigate to the Plant List to add plants to their empty garden.
Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds a plant to their empty garden.
Text that is shown on the 'My Garden' screen when no plants have been added to the user's garden
Text that is shown on each plant on the 'My Garden' screen which says the word Planted to show date of planting below
Text that is shown on each plant on the 'My Garden' screen which says the word Last Watered to show date of last watering below
The label for the Share menu item

trans-unit.source: Check out the %s plant in the Android Sunflower app
trans-unit.note: The default messaged used when sharing a plant on SNS, etc.
Title for the photo gallery screen
Prefix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered. Used in combination with watering_needs_suffix.
Suffix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered, singular. Used in combination with watering_needs_prefix: 'Watering needs: every day'.
Text indicating when the the plant should next be watered, singular. Used in conjunction with last watered date. 'May 24, 2018 - water tomorrow.'.
Accessibility text for each of the plant images shown in the 'My garden' and 'Plant list' screens.
Content description for the clickable image to navigate to the gallery screen
Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the plant detail screen.
